New Records: Dinesh Karthik scored his maiden T20I half-century
South Africa had their lowest total in T20 Internationals in India
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock was run out
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa were missing key bowlers Kagiso Rabada and Wayne Parnell
Quinton de Kock returned to the team
Post-Match Reflections: The next match is the decider in Bengaluru
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch remained tricky to bat on
Key player departures affected both teams
